buffalo3d.vos

Class Color4

  • java.lang.Object
    • buffalo3d.vos.Color4

  • public class Color4
extends Object
    Simple struct/VO. Expected range of [0,255] for r, g, b, and a (Unfortunately stored as shorts's, not byte's, since Java bytes only go up to 128 :( )
